snippet: Hiram Monserrate, a former city councilman, asked the Council for discretionary funds for a nonprofit organization, and used some of the money to benefit his campaign.
abstract: Hiram Monserrate, former New York City councilman and state senator, pleads guilty to improperly using City Council money to finance a failed political campaign.
lead_paragraph: Hiram Monserrate, a former city councilman, asked the Council for discretionary funds for a nonprofit organization, and used some of the money to benefit his campaign.

headline.seo: Monserrate Pleads Guilty to Misusing City Council Funds
headline.main: Monserrate Pleads Guilty to the Misuse of City Funds
headline.print_headline: Monserrate Pleads Guilty To the Misuse of City Funds
